Pankaj M Munjal is an Indian businessman and the chairman and managing director for Hero Cycles Limited, based in Punjab, India. He was born on December 15, 1962, in Ludhiana, Punjab, India. He took over the executive duties for Hero Cycles Ltd in 2010 and became the chairman and managing director of Hero Motors Limited in July 2015. He has been a non-executive director of Munjal Showa Limited since May 16, 1985. His net worth is estimated to be $5 Million.

Pankaj M Munjal is an Indian businessman, and chairman and managing director of Hero Cycles Limited, based in Punjab, India. He took over the company from his father in 2015. Born on 15 December 1962, Munjal has a love for automobiles and is the son of late Om Prakash Munjal, founder of Hero Cycles. He completed his early schooling at The Lawrence School, Sanawar, and graduated in Science and training in Automotive Manufacturing at Kettering University. He also attended executive programs at London Business School and Harvard University. Munjal joined his father's company in 1988 and became Co-chairman and managing director in 2011. He took over the executive responsibilities of Hero Cycles Ltd in 2010 and became chairman and managing director at Hero Motors Limited in July 2015. He has been a non-executive director at Munjal Showa Limited since May 16, 1985.
